template:
current spectra x {{currtrack.currentSpectra.xClosest}} / y {{currtrack.currentSpectra.yClosest}} / index {{currtrack.currentSpectra.indexClosest}}
selected spectra x {{currtrack.overlaySpectra.xClosest}} / y {{currtrack.overlaySpectra.yClosest}} / index {{currtrack.overlaySpectra.indexClosest}}

Default layer.title: Boxplot of current variable (clicked) with current value (green "+")
Default layer.name: Default layer

selectSpectra.title: Boxplot of current variable (hoovered) with current value (green "+")
selectSpectra.name: Default layer

modules.title: Boxplot of current variable (clicked) with current value (green "+")

script:
var t = API.getData('trackData')

t.minSpectra.indexClosest += 1
t.maxSpectra.indexClosest += 1
t.currentSpectra.indexClosest += 1
t.overlaySpectra.indexClosest += 1


API.createData('currtrack', t)

Default layer.title: Select multiple spectra in the table to display them here
Default layer.name: Default layer

modules.title: Select multiple spectra in the table to display them here
